about_the_game:
Overview

Build your own deck by placing items in storage!
Once you have purchased various items, organized your storage, and built your deck, you can compete with other players!
If you corner your opponent, you may be able to see his/her special appearance!
Conversely, if you are cornered, you can ......
Win so that you don't lose to your enemies and aim for a higher rank!

Storage

Fill the limited space with items!
Expand your storage to become a more powerful deck and defeat your enemies!

Items

Various powerful weapons and items are available!
Furthermore, when certain items are crossed with each other, they evolve into more powerful items!
Organize your items by considering what kind of items will happen with each other!

Characters

Three attractive characters appear in the game!
Aim for a winning streak by defeating enemies along with your favorite characters!

Opponent

Players' opponents fight against decks actually used by other players!
Check out other players' decks to build a better deck!
There are Ranked Matches, so fight against players of the same rank as you and aim for a higher rank!
Casual matches are free to play regardless of rank, so try out different decks.

content_descriptors.notes: The costumes of female characters in the game may be torn and sexually explicit.

name: GirlsStrage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: More than 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: More than 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Challenge auto-battles by successfully placing items in the storage possessed by cute girls! Purchase rare items and create your own original item placement. When you are ready, compete against other players and win with the girls!
